segments.text: I wonder if I could possibly borrow two bikes from the shop tomorrow ? I ’ ll take actual care of them . I promise you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . All right , Mark . Just this once . But you have to pick them up yourself . I ’ m a very busy man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s all right . It ’ s very kind of you . Can I come around now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d rather you didn ’ t come immediately as I said I ’ m very busy at the moment . Come after lunch , Mark .
segments.speaker: S2
